document_name: National multi-risk plan for disaster preparedness and response
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/BFA/2013/BFA-2013-12-25-National multi-risk plan for disaster preparedness and response_472b3e31158103df6e87c1ff5047d8c1.pdf
document_description: Burkina Faso's national contingency plan for disaster preparedness and response aims to: (i) clarify the relationship / responsibilities between the different technical services of the State and humanitarian partners; ii) facilitate the coordination of actions and make it possible to harmonise sectoral plans; iii) Identify and reduce the most likely risks; (iv) provide a general framework for joint planning covering emergency risks; (v) Integrate the process of prevention, preparedness and response to emergencies into national development plans and programs; vi) reduce response times and the number of life losses.
